item.title: Spider Exercise
item.description: On this page you find guitar tab for the spider exercise to improve your dexterity and finger independence.

item.title: EADG For Those About To Slap - Bass Player Hard Rock Design
item.description: A cool design for bass players who enjoy hard rock and heavy metal music and mostly play their instrument in standard E tuning. / This bassist design shows the letters E, A, D and G in a hard rock style font separated by a bass icon and the text “FOR THOSE ABOUT TO SLAP” in a serif font… • Millions of unique designs by independent artists. item.title: Play Ukulele - White Red Design For Uke Players
item.description: This design is for musicians who love to play the ukulele. It shows the word PLAY in bold white italic letters on a red background and above it a simple ukulele drawing all enclosed by a white rectangle. Show your love for the uke with this design or give it as a gift to someone who loves to play t… • Millions of unique designs by independent artists. Find your thing.

item.title: 7 Modern Musical Modes Cheat Sheet
item.description: This cheat sheet shows the 7 modern musical modes Ionian, Dorian, Phrygian, Lydian, Mixolydian, Aeolian, Locrian, and for each of them the tonic relative to the major scale, the step sequence and an example whole note scale. The scales make clear how these modes work and show that music theory does… • Millions of unique designs by independent artists. Find your thing.

item.title: Guitar Fretboard C Major Scale and Chord 12 Frets
item.description: This design shows 12 frets of a guitar fretboard and the positions of the notes of the C major scale C, D, E, F, G, A, B. The C, E and G notes, that form the C major triad, are shown as blue, yellow and orange and the other notes as white circles. Knowing the notes on the fretboard is extremely hel… • Millions of unique designs by independent artists. Find your thing.

item.title: Ukulele Player Design Hazel Retro Handwriting & Uke Drawing
item.description: A cool retro design for ukulele players showing the word Ukulele in a handwritten script font and a simple uke drawing “underlining” it. Share your love for this awesome Hawaiian instrument with this 70s style design on a shirt or one of the available products. It also makes for a nice birthday present or Christmas gift for family and friends. • Millions of unique designs by independent artists. Find your thing.
